title: Winter Lentil Soup in a Jar
ingredients: ['100g dry split peas', '40g beef stock granules', '50g pearl barley', '100g dry lentils', '4 tablespoons dried onion flakes', '2 teaspoons dried Italian herb seasoning', '90g uncooked long-grain white rice', '2 bay leaves', '75g uncooked alphabet pasta or any other pasta you prefer']
